product_name: REI Heavyweight Crew Shirt - Men's Tall
long_description: Whether you're hiking, skiing, snowshoeing or mountaineering, the men's tall REI Heavyweight Crew long underwear shirt will help you feel warmer, drier and more comfortable. This base layer's heavyweight polyester/spandex fabric wicks sweat and dries fast; brushed inner face provides a soft touch. 4-way stretch enhances comfort and provides a full range of motion. Nonchafing flatseam construction and a smooth outer surface make it easy to layer the shirt under other clothing. With UPF 50+ sun protection, the men's tall REI Heavyweight Crew long underwear shirt is also great to wear alone. Extended length helps shirt stay tucked in when you're active.
